column1: Smoque BBQ////this is probably the sexiest tasting b-b-q i've tasted.  i haven't gotten my panties in a bunch over food in such a long time.  the pulled pork was amazing.  the mac-n-cheese made my mouth explode.  i bragged to my friends through the day of my feat of smoque.  i would be a happy fattie if i could come here at least once a week.
